name: Aluva Manappuram
description: A famous Shiva temple on the banks of the Periyar River, known for rituals and peaceful surroundings.

name: Lulu Mall Kochi
description: One of the largest malls in India with shopping, dining, cinema, and entertainment options.

name: Mangalavanam Bird Sanctuary
description: An urban green lung of Kochi, home to migratory birds and mangroves. A peaceful nature retreat.

name: Cherai Beach
description: A serene beach with calm waters and picturesque views. Popular for family outings and sunset views.

name: Hill Palace Museum
description: The largest archaeological museum in Kerala, showcasing royal artifacts, paintings, and heritage exhibits.
